name: C4D Woo Attribute Color
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
Set color code for variation product. So easy to create color label, and can switch image product when click on color button.

This plugin is used in C4D Vision – Responsive WooCommerce Theme

You can view here http://coffee4dev.com/responsive-woocommerce-theme-c4d-vision/

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d woo attribute color’
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Woo Countdown Sale Product.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-woo-attribute-color-image’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
